page.title: 11HUMSHAUGH RECREATION
page.content: INTERESTS HERE ARE VARIED. THE HAUGHTON ROAD IS FAVOURED BY JOGGERS, WALKERS, CYCLISTS AND MOTOR CYCLISTS. THE POPULAR CYCLE IS BMX AND THE SKILL TO PERFORM 'WHEELIES'. RIVER{FISHING IS POPULAR BUT MUCH OF THE RIVER IS PRIVATELY OWNED SO ONE MUST JOIN THE FISHING CLUB OR BUY A WEEKLY/DAILY LICENCE. SEVERAL YOUNGSTERS HORSE RIDE FOR PLEASURE, HUNTING OR AS PART OF THEIR WORK. IN THE EVENINGS YOUNG ADULTS MEET IN THE LOCAL{HOSTELRY}TO DRINK BEER OR SOFT DRINKS AND PLAY POOL; DARTS, DOMINOES AND THE 'WEEKLY DRAW' ARE POPULAR AT THE CROWN. PRACTICALLY EVERY HOUSEHOLD HAS TELEVISION AND RADIO WHICH KEEPS THE INHABITANTS UP TO DATE WITH NEWS AND 'POP' MUSIC. THE BOOK STALL AT FETES PROVIDES READING MATTER BUT MANY LOOK FORWARD TO THE FORTNIGHTLY VISIT OF THE COUNTY{LIBRARY}VAN.
